title: Portrait on Wicker
description: This is the sequel to Blood on White Wicker and it takes place eleven years later. Judith McCain has become a psychologist and returns to New Orleans in search of her missing sister. During her search, she uncovers the biggest pedophile ring ever known to the FBI and they enlist her help to break the case. It involves some very important people and also one of the foster parents she had lived with for a few months after the whore house she had lived was shut down when she was sixteen.She almost gets herself killed when she trusts the wrong person.
author: Peggy Holloway
